room_title: Escape room "Diamond Heist" by Do You Even Escape? in Harrisburg
room_description: You’ve broken into a jewelry store to steal the precious Royal diamond, a 28 carat purple stone worth 7.8 million dollars! Unfortunately, you’ve managed to trigger the alarm, and now you are locked in the store! You have 60 minutes until the police arrive. You must have all the gemstones back in place and convince them you are a new employee in order to walk away unsuspected. Bonus points if you manage to snag the Royal diamond on the sly.
